email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, and 250m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Given the current market, we were hoping for something in the low 50s, say $50.75. Can you check with the owner if they can adjust? Also, what are the demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I spoke with the owner, and they are willing to come down to $51.00 per metric ton. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $51.00 is acceptable, but we’d like to cap the demurrage at $18,000 per day. Can you confirm this with the owner? Also, please send over the full vessel details and laycan confirmation. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the owner has agreed to cap demurrage at $18,000 per day. Attached are the full vessel details and laycan confirmation (15-20 October). Please review and let me know if everything is in order. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. We’ll proceed with the MV Ocean Star at $51.00 per metric ton and $18,000 demurrage per day. Please send over the charter party agreement for review. Thanks for your help! Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah
